markdownRemark.html: Large shopping center located at the foot of the ring road of Granada. Large covered and uncovered parking. The shopping center has all the shops you need and a large variety of restaurant. There are also cinemas and a children's play area. A bonus is the beautiful views of the Sierra Nevada.

frontmatter.title: Centro Comercial Nevada
